history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_Reals_1. qsimpl time: 1 use: sin,is_lim_div,is_lim_Reals_1. qsimpl time: 1 use: sin,is_lim_div,is_lim_Reals_1,Derive. qsimpl time: 1 use: sin,is_lim_div,is_lim_Reals_1,Derive. qsimpl time: 1 use: sin,is_lim_div,is_lim_Reals_1,R1_neq_R0,Derive.

exceptions.exn: Unable to unify "forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), limit1_in f (fun y : R => y <> x) l x -> is_lim f x l" with "forall (i p : nat) (x : R), (p < i)%nat -> Derive_n (fun x0 : R => x0 ^ p) i x = 0".

exceptions.tactic: apply (is_lim_div (fun x => sin x) (fun x => x) 0 0 0).
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), limit1_in f (fun y : R => y = x -> False) l x -> is_lim f x l i, p : nat x : R H0 : (p < i)%nat Unable to unify "is_lim (fun y : R => sin y / y) 0 (Rbar_div 0 0)" with "Derive_n (fun x : R => x ^ p) i x = 0".

In environment H3 : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), limit1_in f (fun y : R => y = x -> False) l x -> is_lim f x l H2 : forall (f g : R -> R) (x lf lg : Rbar), is_lim f x lf -> is_lim g x lg -> (lg = 0 -> False) -> ex_Rbar_div lf lg -> is_lim (fun y : R => f y / g y) x (Rbar_div lf lg) i, p : nat x : R H0 : (p < i)%nat H4 : R Unable to unify "R" with "Derive_n (fun x : R => x ^ p) i x = 0".

In environment H5 : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), limit1_in f (fun y : R => y = x -> False) l x -> is_lim f x l H1 : forall (f g : R -> R) (x lf lg : Rbar), is_lim f x lf -> is_lim g x lg -> (lg = 0 -> False) -> ex_Rbar_div lf lg -> is_lim (fun y : R => f y / g y) x (Rbar_div lf lg) i, p : nat x : R H0 : (p < i)%nat H4, H7 : R Unable to unify "R" with "Derive_n (fun x : R => x ^ p) i x = 0".

In environment H3 : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), limit1_in f (fun y : R => y = x -> False) l x -> is_lim f x l H2 : forall (f g : R -> R) (x lf lg : Rbar), is_lim f x lf -> is_lim g x lg -> (lg = 0 -> False) -> ex_Rbar_div lf lg -> is_lim (fun y : R => f y / g y) x (Rbar_div lf lg) i, p : nat x : R H0 : (p < i)%nat H4, H7, H8 : R Unable to unify "1 <> 0" with "Derive_n (fun x : R => x ^ p) i x = 0".

In environment H6 : 1 = 0 -> False H5 : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), limit1_in f (fun y : R => y = x -> False) l x -> is_lim f x l H1 : forall (f g : R -> R) (x lf lg : Rbar), is_lim f x lf -> is_lim g x lg -> (lg = 0 -> False) -> ex_Rbar_div lf lg -> is_lim (fun y : R => f y / g y) x (Rbar_div lf lg) i, p : nat x : R H0 : (p < i)%nat H4, H7, H8, H10 : R Unable to unify "0" with "Derive_n (fun x : R => x ^ p) i x".

original: apply is_lim_Reals_1. apply (is_lim_div (fun x => sin x) (fun x => x) 0 0 0). - unfold sin. apply (Derive (fun x => x) 0). - simpl. apply (Derive (fun x => 1) 0). - intro H0. apply R1_neq_R0. apply (is_lim_exp_m H0). - apply Reals_not_0. apply eq_refl.
